title:
Hartree-Fock approximation for non-Coulomb interactions in three and
  two-dimensional systems
authors: Vlad-Mihai Ene, Ilinca Lianu and Ioan Grosu
abstract:
We analyzed the Hartree-Fock approximation for an electron system. The
interaction between particles is modeled by a non-Coulombian potential. We
analyzed both the three-dimensional and two-dimensional systems. We obtained
accurate analytical results for the particle energy, the particle velocity, the
ground state energy of the system as well as the momentum dependent density of
states. The previous classical results for the Coulombian case were reobtained
as particular cases.
